G

game - package game
 
game.monsters - package game.monsters
 
GameEnvironment - Class in game
The GameEnvironment contains everything else in the game and keeps track of game status, specifically it contains the Player entity, Shop entity, the battles the player can participate in and the number of days, current day and difficulty.
GameEnvironment() - Constructor for class game.GameEnvironment
Constructs a default GameEnvironment, with a default empty player, zero days, initializes the current day to 1, the difficulty to normal, initializes the shop and battle containers.
GameEnvironmentTest - Class in test
 
GameEnvironmentTest() - Constructor for class test.GameEnvironmentTest
 
GameOverCommandLine - Class in commandline
The end of the command line program.
GameOverCommandLine() - Constructor for class commandline.GameOverCommandLine
 
GameOverScreen - Class in GUI
Game over screen shows player score, days passed, and options to restart or end game.
GameOverScreen(ScreenManager) - Constructor for class GUI.GameOverScreen
Initializes the screen, getting the game environment from the screen manager.
generateEnemyTeam(int, int) - Static method in class game.Generation
Randomly generates an enemy Player, using the above generate functions for Monster and Item.
generateEnemyTeamTest() - Method in class test.GenerationTest
 
generateItem(int, int, boolean) - Static method in class game.Generation
Generates a random item from the current day, using ItemBuilder to create the items.
generateItemTest() - Method in class test.GenerationTest
 
generateMonster(int, int, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class game.Generation
Generates a random monster by using Monster.genRandomName(), and deriving the monster level from the day and difficulty.
generateMonsterTest() - Method in class test.GenerationTest
 
generatePlayerMonster(int, int) - Static method in class game.Generation
Public interface for generating player monster (start or shop), using the private general monster generation function.
generateWildMonster(int, int) - Static method in class game.Generation
Public interface for generating wild monster (wild battle), using the private general monster generation function.
Generation - Class in game
Handles random generation of Monsters, Players, and Items, given the day and difficulty (1-3).
Generation() - Constructor for class game.Generation

Simple getter for the current day.
getDamage() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Get's the monster's base damage, this should only be used for display purpases as for attacks the getTotalDamage() function should be used.

Sums up all the currently active damage buff's or debuffs.
